segments.advisor_message: So, uh, you mentioned your, um, dependent, right? Can you just, like, remind me of their full name again?
segments.client_message: Yeah, it's, uh, Emily Johnson, I think that's, um, the name you’re looking for.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And then, um, when was Emily born? Like, her date of birth?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! She was born on, um, the 15th of March, 2010. So that’s, uh, 15-03-2010.

segments.advisor_message: Thanks! And, uh, how long will she be a dependent, you know, like until what date?
segments.client_message: Um, I guess until she turns 18 or whatever. So, that’ll be, like, 15-03-2028. That's when she, you know, stops being a dependent.
